channel.title: Granite maul help :D
channel.description: Hi im trying to edit a server i downloaded its based off project insanity its called evoscape im editing it a lot but its an emulous server so the files and stuff are a lil different ive been trying to fix the granite maul special for a while but i cant seem to get it the problem is that the special bar wont highlight when i click it with the maul equipped and it wont do it even though it doesnt highlight any ideas how i can make this work and make it highlight the special bar and hit twice??

item.title: Granite maul help :D
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi im trying to edit a server i downloaded its based off project insanity its called evoscape im editing it a lot but its an emulous server so the files and stuff are a lil different ive been trying to fix the granite maul special for a while but i cant seem to get it the problem is that the special bar wont highlight when i click it with the maul equipped and it wont do it even though it doesnt highlight any ideas how i can make this work and make it highlight the special bar and hit twice??
